Description of incident: American Express announced, as part of an investigation by law enforcement and/or American Express, the company discovered a data breach that involved customer information. The data recovered included American Express cardholder acount numbers, names and other card information such as the expiration date. They have stated that Social Security numbers were not impacted and their systems did not detect any unauthorized activity on card holders accounts as related to this incident.UPDATE: (1/16/2014): American Express has sent out a new letter addressed to customers affected by the data breach. This new communication entailed information that one of the merchants that they purchased goods with was affected by the breach. The information breached did not change, in that card holder account numbers, names and other card information such as expiration date were compromised. No Social Security numbers were impacted.
